column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We went an hour before closing
column2: but the place was still packed. We were seated right away
column4: but service was slow & we had 4 or 5 different servers
column5: which threw me off a bit. I guess I'm being picky
column6: but no heads up about it...me likes to build a rapport with whoever is going to be handling my food
